forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 60 in the afternoon. West wind 3 to 7 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 50. West southwest wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco today, the sun beholds a gentle reign beneath a tapestry of shifting clouds, casting a soft light over the iconic skyline. The air feels refreshingly crisp, a whisper of ocean breeze teasing the edges of the day, with temperatures gracefully easing from the mid-60s into a cooling evening. As midday transitions to afternoon, the robust clarity of the city comes into full view, unmarred by fog, save for the distant embrace of the marine layer caressing the Golden Gate, hinting at the ocean's presence yet maintaining a respectful distance. 

As nightfall approaches, the sky will don a coat of partly cloudy comfort, while the gentle west-southwest wind carries the whispers of the bay. Dressing in layers will be advisable; a light sweater or jacket will suit the relaxed atmosphere, perfect for wandering down to a cozy café or meandering along the waterfront. This serene day beckons one to stroll through a local park or perhaps pause at a quiet spot with a book in hand, relishing the flavors of the city and the subtle rustle of leaves overhead as dusk beckons softly.
